Package sbw.architecture.bus.protocol

Class RequestService<_PAYLOAD_ extends A_Payload<?,?>>

java.lang.Object
sbw.architecture.bus.protocol.A_Request
sbw.architecture.bus.protocol.RequestService<_PAYLOAD_>
Type Parameters:
_PAYLOAD_ - - the payload type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<RequestService<?>>
public class RequestService<_PAYLOAD_ extends A_Payload<?,?>> extends A_Request implements Comparable<RequestService<?>>
Defines a request to have a servicer do something with a given payload at a defined.

  • Constructor Details

    • RequestService

      public RequestService(Identifier servicerID, _PAYLOAD_ payload)
      Creates a nonpreempting service request. The interval is implicitly new Interval().
      Parameters:
      servicerID - - the identifier of the servicer this request applies to
      payload - - the arbitrary payload to deliver to the servicer; no defensive copy is made

    • RequestService

      public RequestService(Identifier servicerID, _PAYLOAD_ payload, boolean isPreempting)
      Creates a service request with a preempting state. The interval is implicitly new Interval().
      Parameters:
      servicerID - - the identifier of the servicer this request applies to
      payload - - the arbitrary payload to deliver to the servicer; no defensive copy is made
      isPreempting - - whether this is a preempting request, which takes priority over nonpreempting ones

    • RequestService

      public RequestService(Identifier servicerID, Interval interval, _PAYLOAD_ payload)
      Creates a nonpreempting service request.
      Parameters:
      servicerID - - the identifier of the servicer this request applies to
      interval - - the interval at which this request will be serviced by its servicer
      payload - - the arbitrary payload to deliver to the servicer; no defensive copy is made

    • RequestService

      public RequestService(Identifier servicerID, Interval interval, _PAYLOAD_ payload, boolean isPreempting)
      Creates a service request with a preempting state.
      Parameters:
      servicerID - - the identifier of the servicer this request applies to
      interval - - the interval at which this request will be serviced by its servicer
      payload - - the arbitrary payload to deliver to the servicer; no defensive copy is made
      isPreempting - - whether this is a preempting request, which takes priority over nonpreempting ones
